snippet: Bin-It and Jugglebox Moving both recently entered the New York moving market, delivering stacks of reusable plastic moving boxes and picking them up after the move is complete.
abstract: Bin-It and Jugglebox Moving have both recently entered the New York area moving market, offering stackable plastic moving boxes for rent, allowing New Yorkers to abandon the quest for cardboard moving boxes; both services serve New York City and northern New Jersey, and both plan to expand geographically.
lead_paragraph: Bin-It and Jugglebox Moving both recently entered the New York moving market, delivering stacks of reusable plastic moving boxes and picking them up after the move is complete.

headline.seo: Rent-a-Box Services Make Moving Easier for Some
headline.main: Rent-a-Box Services Make Moving Easier for Some
